ReviewList.Text: I am never one to believe anything I read and this book made it so hard to do that , that I actually got done reading it and thinking wow that was great.  This book really opened my eyes to what could happen how Jesus does work in very special ways.  The author does an amazing way of telling the story but also making sure you connect wight the book in your own ways. I would definitely encourage any one who is stumbling in there faith or wants to reassure it to read this book.

Fantastic. This isn't a terribly long book, but it conveys everything that is necessary. The author paints a really clear picture of Jesus through his conversation with Michael, the main character. Though it is presented kind of like a story, Jesus's conversation with Michael is packed full of wisdom. It will certainly help you think about life in a different way, and this book is truly uplifting.

Unquestionably, Breakfast with Jesus is one of the most inspiring book I’ve ever read. It has shattered my ignorance and broke the yoke of selfishness. I was being totally transformed to image of Jesus as Michael communed with him. Congrats to Ivan King for contextualizing and painting such a clear image of Christ! A must read!

Here goes a colorful masterpiece of the image of Jesus. It had me hooked like a fish within seconds and from there on there was never a dull moment. The lessons are powerful and very applicable. I am truly grateful for a copy of this book!

I always say my faith is growing each day and every day I read this book it grew even more.  My husband and I are in different paths with our faith so a friend told us to read this book and it has brought us closer together by the story.  I am so grateful for Ivan King in writing such a powerful book.  I would defiantly read any more books with my Ivan King because I know they would be amazing.

The person who wrote this book has a very different view of Jesus that I do.  He was very smug and judgmental towards others and on top of that, gave away the ending to an HBO series.  Don't read this book unless you want to be disappointed and feel looked down upon.

I don't believe one word of this book as I don't believe Jesus would act as this author depicted. I am so sorry that I ordered it.  I would not have given it even one star but I couldn't write a comment without it.
Really a nice book. This book worthy of five star. The best one regarding on inspiration ever i have had. Really author did a great job here. Author described the story very well. No doubt at all.
It was a nice quick read. There are some good thoughts in it. Makes you think about how you would react if really given a face to face meeting.
Lucid and clear presentation. But more biblical truth must need be expounded. Hoping for an elaborate exposition of the Gospel.

This story deserves a 5-star rating.  It is so enlightening & worthy of sharing as it may help you understand the choices we face in our lives.  It's inspiration sheds light into the darkness of our times.  My hope is that you will enjoy & learn from it.  The short time it takes to read it, is worth your time.
